# Installing

## Software Download

### Mac, Windows, and Linux
[CSUN Software Downloads](https://w2.csun.edu/it/software-services/software/software-downloads)

Just run the default options, next, next, next, and then install.

### Phones

[IPhone Global Protect](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/globalprotect/id1400555706)
[Android Global Protect](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.paloaltonetworks.globalprotect&hl=en_US&pli=1)

Just run default options, and install

# Using GP

## Windows 
> I am on windows

1. open the app

![Global Protect Icon](./images/GP_Icon.png)

2. open the minize apps on your task, and click the small icon

![Global Protect Minimized](./images/GP_Mini.png)

3. use the following domain `vpn.csun.edu`

![CSUN GP Portal](./images/CSUN_GP_Portal.png)

4. log into your portal

![CSUN Portal Login](./images/CSUN_portal.png)

5. you are now connected

![Connected](./images/gp_done.png)
